definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: palm (-tree) figure, as ornament;—´[[ת]]: Ez Eze 41:18 + (van d. H. ´[[תִּמּ]]:, so throughout); pl. [[תִּמׂרׂת]] 1Ki 6:29 + (Gi ´[[תִּמּ]]:), [[תִּמׂרִים]] Ez Eze 40:16 +; sf. [[תִּימׂרָיו]] v:Eze 40:22 Qr (Kt [[תימרו]]);—palm-figure in Sol.’s temple 1Ki 6:29, 1Ki 6:32, 1Ki 6:32, 1Ki 6:35, 1Ki 7:36, 2Ch 3:5; in Ezekiel’s temple Ez Eze 40:16, Eze 40:22, Eze 40:26 + 10 t. Eze 40, Eze 41.
